Name: Dynasty Skardu by Air
Itinerary: Air tour to Skardu with stay at Dynasty Hotel, visits to Shangrila Lake, Upper Kachura Lake and local attractions.

Name: Shangri La Resort Skardu
Itinerary: Luxury air tour staying at Shangri-La Resort with comprehensive Skardu sightseeing and lake visits.

Name: Chunda Valley Skardu Trip
Itinerary: Tour covering Chunda Valley, Shangrila Lake, Kachura Lake and Manthoka Waterfall with airport transfers.

Name: Katpana Skardu Trip
Itinerary: Road trip to Skardu via Karakoram Highway covering Katpana Desert, Cold Desert and local attractions.

Name: Shangrila Khaplu Skardu
Itinerary: Extended tour covering Skardu, Shangrila, Khaplu Valley and Shigar with comprehensive Northern Areas experience.
